name: Coral: A Halo Fan Game
description:
Coral is a Halo Fan Game that brings classic Halo gameplay to PC. It will include an all-new Campaign experience about an outer colony planet called Coral, known for a secret Forerunner artifact buried beneath the surface. Step into the shoes of Spartan-3 Juliet-Team as the secrets of the facility- and the planet, is revealed.

The Firefight mode will be reminiscent of Halo 3 ODST and Halo: Reach’s firefight mode, and the new Flood survival mode is a firefight and Call of Duty Zombies inspired endless horde mode.
